title: Atollo Style Table Lamp
body: An iconic piece from 1977, the style Atollo Table Lamp became a symbol of Italian design. Its smooth cylinder, cone and shade brings together the past, present and future, combining them to form a timeless and elegant piece. The radiated light is a soft, diffused glow that is pleasing to the eyes. Ideal on a desk, console or cupboard, a sinuous and simple design that perfectly suits both living and work environments.
